Class GuiController

java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:

extends java.lang.Object

    • addResource

      Adds resources when clicked
      Parameters:
      res - Clicked Resource
      xLabel - Label cliked
      rc - ResourceCount that will be updated
      count - Amount of resources that are needed
      coin - ImageView of the coin
      shield - ImageView of the shield
      servant - ImageView of the servant
      rock - ImageView of the rock
